pr_title: refactor: rename the authentication policy and move policies into policy folder

timeline.message: refactor: rename the authentication policy and move policies into policy folder

timeline.bodyText: Will this fix the PLAYBACK mode issue?
timeline.author: yaohaizh

replies.bodyText: Also, rename this file to AzureTestCredential. There should be no more s in the credential.
replies.author: yaohaizh

replies.bodyText: Yes, and actually for playback mode, it will no need for AzureTestCredentials.
replies.author: ChenTanyi
